circulation.title: CIRCULARITY
circulation.content: Environmental and atmospheric problems, especially climate change, which are experienced globally and felt more intensely day by day, are a disaster scenario that developed countries try to tackle through numerous regulations and sanctions, primarily with carbon footprint approaches; however, which still cannot be prevented. DGD Global Technology Inc. is here with you to bring game-changing strategies to all areas of life through the 7Cbasalia complete circular waste management and complete circular technologies at product level projects that take bold steps to completely change waste management policies.

innovation.title: INNOVATION
innovation.content: Our company policy, which considers innovative and value-added products, services, and technologies as fundamental in all areas of life for all business fields, carries out intensive work to create global impacts starting from our immediate environment. We are delighted to be open to your participation in our goal of spreading this strategy to create national development policies by preparing and presenting the innovative approach tradition not in a single product or branch, but in a concept that includes sectoral differences spread across all areas of life, ensuring the creation of legislation in this strategy, and subsequently creating global impacts.

partnership.title: SOLUTION PARTNERSHIP
partnership.content: DGD Global Technology Inc., which records both next-generation technologies and complete circular waste management projects through strong protocols and agreements with all innovative technology hubs it partners with, is honored to work together with all individuals, companies, or institutions who wish to participate either as entrepreneurs or with know-how, both within its own organization and within the framework of full participation principle, towards common human values and common social and economic gains.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We are an organization with contemporary, strong, and innovative foundational perspectives, respectful to humanity and nature on a national and planetary scale, providing opportunities for all ideas and approaches, principled, competitive, and centered on ethical values.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: DGD Global Technology Inc. is a company that conducts project, product and investment activities, as well as technology and knowledge consulting, based on a green and bio-circular, sustainable life model focused on environmental sensitivity and domestic production.

dilek.name: Dilek Koca
dilek.title: Co-Founder
dilek.bio:
A graduate of Uludağ University Faculty of Architecture, Dilek KOCA is an experienced designer specialized in architecture, interior design, and façade systems. With a modern and original design approach, she aims to add value to living spaces by combining aesthetics, functionality, and sustainability in her projects.

 With many years of experience in the construction and decoration sectors, she has carried out numerous successful projects on both national and international levels in areas such as contracting, consultancy, and project management. Currently, she serves as the Chairwoman of the Board at Dekor Center Mimarlık A.Ş. She is also a mother of two daughters and a passionate entrepreneur.

devir.name: Devir Dinçer
devir.title: Co-Founder
devir.bio: A graduate of Ege University Faculty of Communication, Devir DİNÇER is a journalist and educator. In addition to many years of teaching experience in the advertising and public relations sectors, she has also gained extensive expertise in brand and market research, financial market analysis, corporate communications management, and screenwriting. With her broad knowledge and multi-disciplinary background, she brings a holistic perspective to the field of communication.

history.title: OUR HISTORY
history.content: DGD Global Teknoloji Joint Stock Company is a next-generation, corporate company established in October 2024 by three founding partners who are experts in their fields. The company was founded with the goal of creating new lifestyle models focused on technology investments, financial sourcing, and environmental awareness. It brings together various areas of expertise such as architecture, construction, agriculture, and communication consultancy, along with the founders’ professional-level networks and business experience, all based on a foundation of technology.

bioCircularProcess.title: Complete Circular Waste Management Technology
bioCircularProcess.description: Our complete circular waste management technology that doesn't require any separation or disposal costs for all types and tonnages of waste from small and medium-sized enterprises to large integrated facilities and, at an advanced stage, municipal institutions. In addition to obtaining clean water and fuel with 100% conversion, it produces solid outputs consisting of strategic nano elements used in the production of next-generation bio products through an additional process chain.
bioCircularProcess.pageDescription: Discover our sustainable and innovative complete circular waste management technology.

noProcessing.title: No Separation Required
noProcessing.description: Innovative technology that doesn't require separation and disposal costs for all types of waste.

efficiency.title: 100% Conversion
efficiency.description: Produces clean water, fuel, and solid outputs containing strategic nano elements.

scalable.title: Scalable Solution
scalable.description: Applicable at all scales from small businesses to large integrated facilities and municipal institutions.

nanoProducts.title: Next-Gen Nano Products
nanoProducts.description: Our next-generation production technology that yields products of unique durability and quality such as bio-isolation, bio-polymer, bio-cement, and bio-glass after a process setup with strategic raw materials obtained from our complete circular waste technology.
nanoProducts.pageDescription: Discover our next-generation products of unique quality made from raw materials obtained through our complete circular waste technology.

bioIsolation.title: Bio-Isolation
bioIsolation.description: Our environmentally friendly bio-isolation materials offer superior thermal and acoustic insulation properties, maximizing energy efficiency.

bioPolymer.title: Bio-Polymer
bioPolymer.description: Our biopolymers provide an eco-friendly alternative to traditional plastics, combining durability and sustainability.

bioCement.title: Bio-Cement
bioCement.description: Our bio-cement solutions with high durability reduce carbon footprint, bringing a new dimension to the construction industry.

bioGlass.title: Bio-Glass
bioGlass.description: Our bio-glass products, produced with special techniques, offer lighter and more durable properties compared to traditional glass.

radiatorSystems.title: Next-Gen Radiator Systems
radiatorSystems.description: Our energy-efficient, fast and homogeneous heating technology with electric connectivity to nano-paint containing panels and radiators that contain no water or oil, eliminating the need for boiler and natural gas lines in buildings.
radiatorSystems.pageDescription: Discover our energy-efficient heating solutions beyond traditional systems, using electricity without water or oil.

efficiency.title: Energy Efficiency
efficiency.description: New generation technology that provides greater energy savings compared to traditional systems.

installation.title: Easy Installation
installation.description: Simplified installation process that doesn't require boilers, pipelines, or natural gas connections.

materials.title: Innovative Materials
materials.description: Electrically-connected panels and radiators containing nano-paint technology instead of water or oil.

residential.title: Residential Buildings
residential.description: Easily installable heating solutions ideal for apartment units and private homes.

commercial.title: Commercial Spaces
commercial.description: Systems providing homogeneous and fast heating for office buildings and commercial venues.

industrial.title: Industrial Facilities
industrial.description: Customized heating solutions for production areas and storage facilities.

retrofit.title: Renovation Projects
retrofit.description: Systems that can be easily integrated into existing structures with minimal structural intervention.

agricultureGreenhouse.title: Agricultural Greenhouse Heating Technology
agricultureGreenhouse.description: Our agricultural heating technology that provides fast and homogeneous stable temperature in greenhouse units using far infrared rays, maintains humidity balance, prevents fungus and mold formation, and increases photosynthesis rate and crop yield by a minimum of 30%.
agricultureGreenhouse.pageDescription: Discover our agricultural heating technology that offers efficient, stable, and healthy plant growing environments with infrared rays.

infrared.title: Infrared Technology
infrared.description: Provides fast and homogeneous temperature distribution using far infrared rays.

productivity.title: Yield Increase
productivity.description: Accelerates plant growth by increasing photosynthesis rate and improves crop yield.

humidity.title: Humidity Balance
humidity.description: Maintains optimal humidity level in the greenhouse, providing ideal conditions for plants.

prevention.title: Mold & Fungus Prevention
prevention.description: Prevents fungus and mold formation, supporting healthy plant development.

airPurification.title: Nano Air Purification Technology
airPurification.description: Our nano air purification technology that can disinfect 450 m3 area per hour and clean 4500 m2 area in 10 hours from all virus and other pollution factors without performance loss in area expansion, prevents the entry of these factors, can stabilize the oxygen balance in the environment, and can maximize fruit productivity especially in agriculture.
airPurification.pageDescription: Discover our nano technology-based air purification systems that eliminate virus and pollution factors, maintain oxygen balance, and increase fruit productivity.

hourlyCapacity.title: Hourly Capacity
hourlyCapacity.description: Fully disinfects 450 m³ area per hour

purification.title: Complete Purification
purification.description: Eliminates all virus and pollution factors

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: No performance loss in area expansion

indoor.description: For creating healthy environments in homes, offices, and public spaces.

industrial.title: Industrial Applications
industrial.description: For protecting product quality and employee health in production and storage areas.

agriculture.title: Agricultural Applications
agriculture.description: For increasing fruit productivity and preserving harvest quality in greenhouse and storage areas.

construction.title: Our Construction Services
construction.description: Comprehensive construction solutions for all your building needs

consultingServices.title: CONSULTING SERVICES
consultingServices.description: We provide comprehensive consulting services in various areas to help businesses achieve their goals sustainably and efficiently.

sustainabilityReports.title: Sustainability Reports and Documentation
sustainabilityReports.description: We prepare comprehensive sustainability reports and documentation that help organizations track, measure, and communicate their environmental and social impact. Our team of experts follows international standards and best practices to ensure your sustainability reporting meets global requirements.

environmentalImpact.title: Environmental Impact Assessment Reports
environmentalImpact.description: Our environmental impact assessment (EIA) services provide detailed analysis of potential environmental effects of proposed projects. We help organizations navigate regulatory requirements and develop strategies to minimize negative environmental impacts while maximizing project benefits.

qualityManagement.title: Quality Management Systems Consulting
qualityManagement.description: We offer expert guidance on implementing and maintaining effective quality management systems that improve operational efficiency and ensure consistent product and service quality. Our consulting services cover international standards such as ISO 9001 and industry-specific quality frameworks.

informationTechnology.title: Information Technology Consulting
informationTechnology.description: Our IT consulting services help organizations leverage technology to achieve their business objectives. From digital transformation to cybersecurity, our team of IT experts provides strategic guidance and practical solutions tailored to your specific needs.

communicationConsulting.title: Communication Consulting
communicationConsulting.description: We provide strategic communication consulting to help organizations effectively reach their target audiences and achieve their communication objectives. Our services include corporate communications, marketing strategy, public relations, and crisis communication planning.
